Profile (个人简介)

  • Junbin Zhang, PhD Student（张军斌, 在读博士）

  • Computer Science and Information Engineering, National Cheng Kung University

  • （国立成功大学, 资讯工程研究所）

  • Email: p78083025@ncku.edu.tw

  • CPS Lab | Github | Researchgate | Google scholar | ORCID

In 2012, he received a B.S. in Optoelectronic Information from Fujian Normal University Minnan Institute of Science and Technology in China, under the supervision of Prof. Wenqin Yang. In 2016, he received his M.S. in Optics from Fujian Normal University in China, under the supervision of Prof. Zhiyun Huang. In September 2016, he joined Prof. Peng Jin’s laboratory at Shenzhen Graduate School, Peking University（PKU）as a research assistant, mainly conducting research on concentrating photovoltaics and photobiology. In March 2019, he joined Dr. Jianping Li’s research group at the Center of Opto-Electronic Engineering and Technology, Shenzhen Institute of Advanced Technology（SIAT）, Chinese Academy of Sciences（CAS）, as an assistant engineer, mainly conducting research on Ocean Optical Instruments. He has taken part in 1 major instrument special project of the Ministry of Science and Technology and 3 projects of Shenzhen Science and Technology Innovation Committee. The publishing of 4 journal papers and 1 international conference paper, including 2 SCI papers, 1 EI paper, and 1 Chinese core paper, as well as participation in the production of the book "Introduction to Green Lighting Technology". Apply for 6 invention patents and 5 utility model patents, of which 2 invention patents and 5 utility model patents granted.

（他于2012年从福建师范大学闽南科技学院光信息科学与技术专业获得理学学士学位，导师杨文琴教授。2016年从福建师范大学光学专业获得理学硕士学位，导师黄志云教授。2016年9月作为研究助理加入北京大学深圳研究生院，金鹏教授实验室，主要进行聚光光伏、光生物方面的研究。2019年3月作为助理工程师加入中国科学院深圳先进技术研究院，集成所，光电工程技术中心，李剑平博士课题组，主要进行海洋光电检测仪器方面的研究。先后参与科技部重大仪器专项项目1项、深圳市科创委项目3项。科研成果包括发表期刊论文4篇和国际会议论文1篇，其中SCI 2篇，EI 1篇，中文核心1篇，参与《绿色照明技术导论》书籍编写。申请6个发明专利和5个实用新型专利，其中授权2个发明和5个实新专利。）

In September 2019, he was admitted to the Department of Computer Science and Information Engineering, National Cheng Kung University as a Ph.D. student, studying for a Ph.D. degree in AI, under the supervision of Prof. Pei-Hsuan Tsai and Prof. Meng-Hsun Tsai. He won the 2019 National Cheng Kung University Outstanding Mainland Students Scholarship and the 2021 National Cheng Kung University Himalayan Research and Development Foundation Mainland Students Scholarship. Participated in 1 AI project of Taiwan Industrial Technology Research Institute. The scientific research achievements include 1 international conference paper (included by IEEE) and 1 SCI paper. Research interests include Graph Neural Networks (GNN), Computer Vision, Deep Learning, Deep Reinforcement Learning, and Content-Centric Networking. He currently research focuses on video representation learning, temporal action localization, action recognition, semantic reasoning, contrastive learning, visual language pre-training, and multimodal feature fusion based on GNN.

（2019年9月考入台湾成功大学计算机科学与信息工程系博士研究生，攻读AI的博士学位，导师蔡佩璇教授和蔡孟勋教授。他获得了2019年国立成功大学优秀大陆学生奖学金和2021年国立成功大学喜马拉雅研究发展基金大陆学生奖学金。参与台湾工业技术研究院AI项目1项。科研成果包括国际会议论文1篇(IEEE)，SCI论文1篇。研究兴趣包括图神经网络、计算机视觉、机器学习、深度学习、深度强化学习和内容中心网络。他当前的研究主要集中在基于图神经网络开展视频的表示学习、时空动作定位、动作识别、语义推理、对比学习、视觉语言预训练、多模态特征融合。）

  • 2013.09-2016.07. Master of Science. College of Photonic and Electronic Engineering. Fujian Normal University. Supervision of Prof. Zhiyun Huang.（理学硕士，福建师范大学，光电与信息工程学院，导师黄志云教授）
  • 2008.09-2012.07. Bachelor of Science. Fujian Normal University Minnan Institute of Science and Technology. Supervision of Prof. Wenqin Yang.（理学学士，福建师范大学闽南科技学院，导师杨文琴教授）

  • 2016.09-2018.11. Research Assistant. Professor Peng Jin’s laboratory, Peking University Shenzhen Graduate School.（研究助理，北京大学深圳研究生院，金鹏教授实验室）
